Author: fatfatfat159
Text: Omg I so agree  BUT my son thought it was funny to flush the plastic toilet paper holder thing down the toilet so if I have to pee now I have to go to the kids bathroom across the house. I’m already a bad sleeper so I can’t even sleep after walking all the way across the house and back. Fml.
